snippet: The American Ted Ligety captured the giant slalom Friday to become the first man in 45 years to win three gold medals at the world championships.
abstract: American skier Ted Ligety becomes first man in 45 years to win three gold medals at skiing world championships by winning giant slalom in combined time of 2 minutes 28.92 seconds.
lead_paragraph: The American Ted Ligety captured the giant slalom Friday to become the first man in 45 years to win three gold medals at the world championships.

headline.seo: Ted Ligety Pulls Off Rare Triple at Skiing Championships
headline.main: Ligety Completes Rare Triple at Worlds
headline.print_headline: Ligety Completes Rare Triple at the World Championships
